entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 12. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or drizzle. Low 6.
